Features 2 bedrooms with 4 piece bath, plus dishwasher, oven, and microwave in as new condition (never used), 4 burner gas stove, floating vinyl flooring throughout, spacious, covered deck with gorgeous gas-fired fireplace, & insulated wood shed. All the amenities you could wish for on-site, including swimming pool, gym, sauna, and tennis court. Golf course next door, nature and outdoor recreation all around. Bareland strata fee of just $110.00 per month.
Realtor Remarks: Touchbase for showings please. One day's notice would be appreciated, but we'll try to accommodate all requests. If financing, check requirements on recreational properties (re: 25% down) before writing an offer.

Public Remarks: This Is It! This is the home you've been waiting for! Set back from the road and backing on to greenbelt, this beautiful 108 Ranch home has it all. Vaulted ceilings, open concept living area, large functional island in a well laid out kitchen, lots of windows, french doors leading to a private deck, and more. The 2600+ square foot 4 bedroom, 2 bath home also features; main floor laundry, and a big family room with wood stove and spacious workshop down. Need covered parking for your vehicles and your oversized RV? Or a shop to keep you out of the weather? We can even accommodate that with a carport and 2 large steel frame covered buildings - the largest measuring 12x40 and over 12' doors. This one is a must see!
Realtor Remarks: **Please don't let cats out** 1 of the downstairs bedrooms has no closet but lots of room for one or a wardrobe

Public Remarks: Spectacular views of Mt. Cheam from the large patio of this 1182 sq ft, TOP floor, 2 bdrm, 2 bathroom apartment home at the SAPPHIRE. It is in walking distance to shopping and great walking paths. What a wonderful community with radiant hot water heat included in the monthly strata fee. This unit is bright and spacious. Underground secure parking and storage and all appliances included. Amenities - guest suite, exercise room, recreation facility. One of the best locations. Immediate Possession if you want.

Well laid out condo makes both bedrooms feel very private on opposite sides - each with a bathroom. Open-plan kitchen/dining room/living room has no pony wall & comes with cozy gas fireplace (gas & hot water incl in strata fee). Lg laundry room w/ plenty of room for storage - washer/dryer included. Lg balcony looks out towards quiet North greenbelt. Close to shopping, rec centre, library, schools & transportation. No size restriction for your dog, cats ok and no age restrictions (no rentals). Won't last - call for your personal tour.

Home features spacious living room with fireplace, family room with fireplace, hot tub & 3-pc. bath, kitchen with breakfast area & hardwood floors, separate dining room and 3 bedrooms. Outside you will find a private patio area, greenhouse and fruit trees. All on a centrally located, fenced 91 x 131 lot close to schools and shopping.

Public Remarks: View lots, ready to build on. Building plans are included. Unobstructed views over the entire city. The skyline includes Mt. Cheam, the north shore mountains, Chilliwack Mountain and Sumas Mountain. Tucked away, at the eastern edge of Promontory. No traffic. Completely quiet. Forest and nature all around, with public trails easily accessible. The most suitable plan for these lots, due to the elevation, is a rancher with a full basement. Although these homes will have unreal views and big sundecks, there will not be much of a backyard. Access is at the end of Lindeman Street, over the cul-de-sac, and to the right.
Realtor Remarks: Access is at the very end of Lindeman, across the cul-de-sac, and to the right. Bareland Strata lots, strata fee of $82.02/mo, includes water, sewer, liability insurance, and snow removal. This is a bareland strata, completely separated from the Hillcrest Lane Townhomes. Only the access shared.

Public Remarks: Just Right! Time to move, and this home has what you've been waiting for. If a beautiful kitchen is top of your list, you will need to come and see this one! Lots of space, with an island and open concept. Patio doors lead to a covered deck overlooking your large yard. Luxurious living room has a large bay window for light (and a cozy fireplace), with room for your furniture. 5 bedrooms and a master with ensuite, this home is large and in charge! But, if the upstairs isn't enough to impress you, then the basement will--with a 2nd full kitchen, separate entry, and 2 large bedrooms! This house has been very well cared for. The yard is fully established--with trees, lilacs and Saskatoon bushes. Explore your options, because this home has them!!

Pride of ownership! Spacious 1 bed, 1 bath, offers an open modern maple kitchen with a breakfast bar and laminate flooring. Open living/ eating area, gas fireplace, and balcony, includes 6 appliances. Faces quiet side of the building, very easy access to the elevator. Excellent location, minutes to bridges, transportation, shopping, recreation and schools.

Public Remarks: This 2,760 sq ft, well-maintained home is located in a quiet neighbourhood close to schools, parks and recreation. Features include a double garage, paved driveway, large pantry, and a high-efficiency furnace. Roof shingles were replaced two years ago. Other updates include carpeting, Pacific Energy wood stove, and hot water tank. An outside basement entry and second kitchen in the basement give this home suite potential. All appliances are included.

Public Remarks: RENTAL FRIENDLY TOWNHOME in a central location close to all amenities and shopping! Wonderfully maintained home featuring recent updates to kitchen, flooring and paint. Upstairs features 3 bedrooms including a large master bedroom with 2 walk in closets. Great size living room and adjacent dining area PLUS a rare powder room on the main. In-suite laundry and LOTS of storage- easy access to the 3.5' crawl space with tons of room for all the seasonal debris! Fully fenced yard with your own personal storage shed. Parking for 3 plus additional street parking ! Pets are welcome. Don't wait- grab this one while you can!

YTD net distribution for 2017 is $18553  2016 is 18,018.  2015 is $16,178.  Owner pays property taxes. Superb Central Location!  Close to Canada Place, Convention Centre, Ship Terminal and Robson St.  Walking distance to high end shops, restaurants and attractions.  Occupancy rate is excellent. Hotel is professionally managed and operated -Worry-free investment. NOT FOR PRIVATE RESIDENCE.

Public Remarks: This beautifully updated family home in a preferred area has all the amenities any growing family needs. Featuring a huge open concept living space on the main floor with dark hardwood flooring throughout highlighting a fantastic feature piece gas fireplace. Looking out off the dining area is a large deck with picturesque mountain views you can enjoy while drinking your morning coffee or having an evening BBQ with friends and family! The master bedroom has a large walk-in closet and a private ensuite allowing a sanctuary in your own space. Downstairs has loads of space in the rec area to be set up as a games or entertainment room! With 3 bedrooms upstairs and 2 down, there is enough space for everyone!
Realtor Remarks: Door code 4101, roof/windows 2009'ish, Plasma TV wall mount to go with owners.

Public Remarks: Wonderfully located family home. This home has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Quietly situated near schools and playgrounds, this sunny crescent is ideal for a busy family. The yard is nicely private, with established fruit trees, morning-sun deck, and paved driveway...complete with basketball hoop! Inside find nice warm colours throughout, open living/dining/kitchen space (ideal for visiting and entertaining), and a step-out to the nicely private deck. The master features a step-trough to the main bath. Downstairs, the family room is large and cozy (ideal for movie nights) with additional space for a pool table. There is also a spacious bathroom complete with double soaker tub! This affordable home has lots to offer!!
Realtor Remarks: Tennant-occupied. No showings Monday to Friday between 3 pm and 6:30 pm.

Public Remarks: Don't miss out on this great 3 bed 2 bath home located in the heart of Chilliwack. This spacious home features 3 large bedrooms with  lots of  natural light, nice open kitchen with stainless appliances and new tile back splash, huge living room in the basement, new back deck and much more. Located close to parks and all amenities this home is perfect for your growing family. Call today for an exclusive viewing.

Well maintained affordable  townhome is ready to move in. Three bedrooms with one on the main floor and two full baths makes for easy living.  Compact kitchen  and attached eating area leads to private patio. Two decks and  the patio allow lots of outdoor time. Bonus garage and an extra parking spot. This is an adult complex (55+). Close to bus stop and minutes from downtown Sechelt.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate and if  important, Buyer to confirm.  Hot water tank is 2 years old.  No rentals, 1 dog or 1 cat maximum 10 kilos.  First portion ($4589.00) of roof levy ( total  $10,376.52) has been paid.

Public Remarks: Super opportunity,  in the sought-after Foothills area, to own your own home with a 2-bedroom income suite. Nice, clean 5-bedroom, 3-bath home. Master has 2-pc ensuite. Close to schools and UNBC. The yard is completely fenced, and there is a large double garage and extra parking for your boat. Shared laundry. Roof-2008; HWT-2007; furnace approx. 2010 (as per seller). All measurements are approximate, and buyer is to verify if deemed important.
Realtor Remarks: Tenant requires 24 hours notice. Enter suite through main-floor entry down the stairs. Please knock on suite door to ensure tenant isn't home. Tenant currently pays $875 (utilities included) and will be moving out April 30th, 2018.

Public Remarks: Georgian Gardens : Spacious one bedroom with view of North Shore mountains. Quiet location. Urban conveniences abound. Walk to Guildford Mall, the Guildford Recreation Center and the Library. Walk to Super Markets and Walmart. Guildford Medical next door. Two minutes to Highway One. Gas fireplace, included in the maintenance, will warm up the entire apartment.

Public Remarks: Beautiful and bright 1 bedroom and DEN unit features newer carpet, fresh paint, stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops in the kitchen. The large covered deck is perfect for outdoor entertaining. Well run strata, pets allowed (no height restriction) and secure underground parking. All this conveniently located close to transit (West Coast Express), recreation centre, shopping and all levels of school.
Realtor Remarks: SUBJECTS REMOVED $348,000. ATTACHED TEAM ADDENDUM MUST ACCOMPANY ALL OFFERS. Measurements are approximate and should be verified if deemed important.

Public Remarks: Located within the town limits of Vanderhoof. Enjoy the many benefits of this rural property. Spacious 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom home. Ideal for your active family. Lovely open-style kitchen with breakfast nook. Living room with access to the conservatory and sundeck. Basement offers a large family room and the potential for an in-law suite. Outside basement entry leads onto a concrete patio. Property is nicely landscaped, and offers a view of the farmland below. Excellent access for larger vehicles and trucks. Detached garage/workshop, with additional attached storage, is certainly an added value. This is an ideal home for those who enjoy rural living and wish to be close to town!

This spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bath log home is located on a large private lot just steps from the high school, Della Herman theatre and public tennis courts. Recent updates to this charming home include a wood burning rock fireplace, flooring, fencing, and a completely renovated main bath. The living area features an open floor plan and vaulted ceilings. Extras include an outside basement entry, sundeck with excellent views of Hudson Bay Mountain, an office/den on the main floor, a large boot/laundry room, a pantry and cold storage.
Realtor Remarks: House sitter is currently living in the home, please provide 24 hours notice for showings.  PNG $110/mo, Hydro $65/mo.

Public Remarks: Welcome home to Yale Terrace! Your big, beautiful new home embodies garden living at its finest, situated on the quiet side of the building and overlooking the lush gardens feels so serene. Inside your beautiful new home you will find 9 ft high ceilings, crown mouldings and a gas fire place to keep you cozy through the winter. You will love the big open concept kitchen and living area with the large windows letting in lots of natural light its the perfect space for entertaining guests! Your new home is situated in a prime location, close to Historic Downtown Abbotsford, parks, Abbotsford Rec Centre and shopping plus you are in the Fraser Middle & Yale Secondary catchment! Don't delay, come home today!

Beautiful 3 bedroom 2.5 bathroom family home on a spacious corner lot in the 108 Mile Ranch. This well maintained home features a formal living and dining room on the main floor along with a open family room and kitchen area with a large deck off the back. The upstairs is where you will find an oversized master bedroom with walk in closet and ensuite as well as two additional bedrooms and another bathroom. The yard is partially fenced and is perfect for kids and pets. There is an attached double garage as well as a detached workshop and a RV/Boat carport. This home shows well and should be on your viewing list.

FIRST TIME BUYERS! This affordable and spacious 1 bedroom unit located at The Windsor features hard to find insuite laundry and quiet location. Boasting lots of potential- Bring your decorating idea and make the space your own..! Walking distance to SKYTRAIN, Schools, Busses and Shopping. Pet Friendly building - 1 pet welcome! Secure underground parking plus storage.

Public Remarks: Extremely clean and well kept 9 ceiling unit is situated less than 2 blocks from Skytrain and 5 minutes driving to Patullo bridge. Dark laminate floor, high ceilings, large balcony with greenery view, white paint, newer Samsung washer & dryer, custom shelving in closets and storage space. Unit comes with stunning 65 by 50 flat screen TV professionally wall mounted. Facing on inner quite side.The building has on-site caretaker, well kept and secure. 1 parking and storage-locker. Public Remarks: Located within walking distance of the golf course, Lester Centre and the Rec Centre. This home was built in 1995 and offers three spacious bedrooms, including a master with a walk-in closet and ensuite with Jacuzzi tub. On the main level, you will also find a large living room, and kitchen with an access to the deck and dining room. On the lower level, you will find a one-bedroom suite, rec room for the main house, and a garage with plenty of storage. Other features include lane access and ample parking for all your toys.

Public Remarks: Over 700 ft  of pristine river frontage. Coquitlam side of Pitt River. The only privately owned property in the area. Surrounded by Widgeon Creek parkland. Absolutely unique recreational lot directly across from Grant Narrows Boat launch near Swaneset golf, in Pitt Meadows. Close, quick access by boat. 5 minutes to moorage, parking. 15 minutes by kayak! Crystal clear mountain water. Lovely sandy beach. Enjoy boating, wakeboarding, fishing, kayaking, hiking. Good cell, internet, satellite TV service. Dock. Original owners-1st time for sale. Sellers will arrange and pay for a helicopter to bring in a trailer, generator and storage container. Live here in the summer and commute. See the aerial video.

Public Remarks: The Fairlane, walking distance to Mill Lake, transit, shopping and entertainment! Bedrooms split on either side of the living room for privacy, one of the many great features, along with an open floor plan, cozy gas fireplace, spacious laundry room with tons of storage! Families and Pets Welcome! 2 pets allowed with restrictions. Ground floor unit with huge patio area overlooking green lawn. This unit does need some repair.

Stunning Top floor condo in the much desired Westgate Building. This unit features 2 large bedrooms, both with walk-thru closets and full 4 piece ensuites. Large living room with 12 foot coffered ceiling, huge windows capturing the westerly view and a lovely balcony area to sit and relax. The maple kitchen has plenty of storage and comes with eating bar. There is also a great den area for a home office or guest room as well as a nice pantry cupboard off the kitchen and a huge storage room right in the unit. No rentals and pets allowed w/restrictions.
Realtor Remarks: Stunning top floor condo with 12 foot coffered ceiling. 2 beds and den, westerly views.

Public Remarks: GRUV one bedroom with workspace unit available! Investors alert rentals allowed complex. Fabulous open layout with high ceilings and balcony. Building features gym and meeting room. Centrally located walking distance to shopping, restaurants, hospital, sky train, and government buildings. Public Remarks: Wow, this very spacious, 3 bed, 2 bath townhome is a must see. Located at the end of a dead end street, this 45+ end unit town home is very quiet with neighbours on only one side. This home boasts hardwood floors, 2 year old built in vacuum system, and a beautiful gas fireplace. Master is on the main with 2 bedrooms and a bath down. There is a 3ft crawl space to store all those extras you may have. This home has a beautiful southern exposure with amazing views of Mt.Baker, Abbotsford and the Fraser River. Come view with us at our open house on March 30 - 12 - 2pm & March 31st - 2-4 pm.  Please park on the road

Public Remarks: Top floor two bedroom spacious unit just waiting for your ideas. Good, open space, and kids and pets are welcome. Bright corner unit with northern exposure. 2 full baths, and quiet serene end unit. This home boasts natural light and windows offering in open living concept. Gas fireplace and top end stainless appliances. Good sized storage. Call for further details.
Realtor Remarks: Seller motivated, quick possession possible.

Public Remarks: Here is an incredible home in a mature neighbourhood with tons of updates. Flooring, bathrooms, kitchen, doors, paint have all been done and are ready for you to enjoy. The main floor space sets this home apart from others with plenty of room for dining, all while still having a large living area. Two bedrooms on the main floor with the master having a 2pc ensuite. The basement is host to a huge rec room, bedroom, laundry room and storage room. The heated 17'x43' attached garage gives you enough space to park your toys and vehicle in. Fully fenced yard with alley access, updated exterior decks off the house, and two storage sheds. Need three bedrooms on the main? Space is available to easily add it!
Realtor Remarks: Key in the lockbox is for the garage door! Seller would consider having a third bedroom put back in on the main floor.

Public Remarks: Let the inviting entryway draw you into the spacious living room of this beautiful family home. Vaulted ceilings in the main living area and dining room make this (already large) space feel even larger. The kitchen is open to the dining room, making this home perfect for entertaining family and guests. Upstairs you will find 3 of the 4 bedrooms, including the master (with walk-in closet and ensuite). On the bottom level you will find a workshop, storage room and flex room, just waiting to be turned into the perfect family room or home theater. Some recent upgrades include custom cabinetry in one bedroom, custom blinds, pellet stove with tile surround and quartz hearth, plus new paint inside and out.
Realtor Remarks: Interior recently painted; exterior painted 2014; 200-amp electrical; HWT 2015; roof 2007; perimeter drainage 2007; pellet stove and custom surround, quartz hearth 2015; new drywall in living room 2011; custom cabinets )upstairs bedroom) 2013; new garage door and tracks 2014.

Public Remarks: Magnolia Gardens condo complex. New, open, spacious floor plans. This second floor unit offers 2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms with spacious walk-in closets, and a flex room to use as an office or den. Balcony measures 11'2 x 9'2.
